translated: A-ye-ti-po-li-di, cha-fu-mo-ti-po-li-di, wu-sha-na-ti-po-li-di, sha-qiu-luo-di-ti-po-li-di, hu-sha-tuo-po-luo-di-ti-po-li-di, na-hu-po-luo-di-ti-po-li-di, na-zhi-fu-luo-po-luo-di-ti-po-li-di, na-hu-tuo-luo-di-ti-po-li-di, po-ye-po-luo-di-ti-po-li-di, na-po-tuo-luo-di-ti-po-li-di, sha-ye-mi-tuo-na-di-ti-po-li-di, sha-ha (chant the mantra seven times).

original: 黃色線結作六結痛處繫。
analyzed: 黃色線結作六結痛處繫。
translated: Tie a yellow thread with six knots on the painful spot.
This dhāraṇī mantra,

original: 乃是過去七十七億諸佛所說。
analyzed: 乃是過去七十七億諸佛所說。
translated: Was spoken by 7.7 billion Buddhas of the past.
The power of this dhāraṇī,

original: 能令百億佛世界六種震動。
analyzed: 能令百億佛世界六種震動。
translated: Can cause the billion Buddha worlds to shake in six ways.

original: 所有山河石壁皆悉摧碎猶如微塵。
analyzed: 所有山河石壁皆悉摧碎猶如微塵。
translated: All the mountains, rivers, rocks and walls will be crushed and shattered like fine dust,
Becoming a single Buddha world.

original: 其中所有一切萬物皆作金色。
analyzed: 其中所有一切萬物皆作金色。
translated: All the myriad things within it will turn golden in color.
The vast and turbulent waters will no longer be visible.
Only the golden color will be seen, no other colors.
Because of the power of this dhāraṇī,
It can cause the sentient beings in the hundred Buddha worlds,

original: 宿業重罪及三塗苦悉滅無餘。
analyzed: 宿業重罪及三塗苦悉滅無餘。
translated: The heavy karmic offenses and the sufferings of the three evil paths to all be extinguished without remainder.

original: 其中眾生修行讀誦此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 其中眾生修行讀誦此陀羅尼者。
translated: The sentient beings who cultivate and recite this dhāraṇī,
Those who have not given rise to the unsurpassed bodhi mind,
Will all be caused to give rise to the mind and reach the stage of non-retrogression.

original: 先已發心者修行此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 先已發心者修行此陀羅尼者。
translated: Those who have already given rise to the mind and cultivate this dhāraṇī,
Transcending the seventh stage up to the tenth stage.

original: 此陀羅尼金剛三昧大空解脫門。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼金剛三昧大空解脫門。
translated: This dhāraṇī, the adamantine samādhi, is the great emptiness gate of liberation.

original: 菩薩從初發心修行此三昧。
analyzed: 菩薩從初發心修行此三昧。
translated: From the initial generation of the mind of enlightenment, the bodhisattva cultivates this samādhi.

original: 直至道場菩提樹下入金剛定莫不由是。
analyzed: 直至道場菩提樹下入金剛定莫不由是。
translated: Until he enters the adamantine concentration under the bodhi tree at the site of enlightenment, it is all due to this.

original: 第七釋迦牟尼佛欲說大陀羅尼名烏穌耆晝膩多晉言金光照曜。
analyzed: 第七釋迦牟尼佛欲說大陀羅尼名烏穌耆晝膩多晉言金光照曜。
translated: The seventh Śākyamuni Buddha wishes to speak a great dhāraṇī called Uṣaṣi Jyotiṣmatī, which in Chinese means Golden Light Illuminating.

original: 消除三界眾生幽冥隱滯拔其危難。
analyzed: 消除三界眾生幽冥隱滯拔其危難。
translated: It eliminates the darkness and obstructions of sentient beings in the three realms and rescues them from danger.
This dhāraṇī phrase.

original: 乃是過去九十九億諸佛所說我今說之。
analyzed: 乃是過去九十九億諸佛所說我今說之。
translated: Was spoken by ninety-nine koṭīs of buddhas in the past, and I now speak it.

original: 耆路不帝那置　畢耆帝那置　烏穌呼帝那置　耆牟多帝那置　若不都帝那置　阿若波兜帝那置　若波都帝那置　耆牟波若帝那置　烏奢副帝那置　蜜耆穌帝那置　耶蜜耆帝那置　破奴彌帝那置　畢利帝吒帝那置　莎訶誦此呪十四遍。
analyzed: 耆路不帝那置　畢耆帝那置　烏穌呼帝那置　耆牟多帝那置　若不都帝那置　阿若波兜帝那置　若波都帝那置　耆牟波若帝那置　烏奢副帝那置　蜜耆穌帝那置　耶蜜耆帝那置　破奴彌帝那置　畢利帝吒帝那置　莎訶誦此呪十四遍。
translated: Jiluobudi-nazhi Piqie-nazhi Wusuo-hudi-nazhi Qimou-tadi-nazhi Ruobudou-tadi-nazhi Aruhe-padou-tadi-nazhi Ruopadou-tadi-nazhi Qimou-piao-jadi-nazhi Wushe-fudi-nazhi Mishi-susu-tadi-nazhi Yemishi-jadi-nazhi Punami-tadi-nazhi Pili-dizha-jadi-nazhi Saha Recite this mantra fourteen times.

original: 黃色縷結作十四結痛處繫。
analyzed: 黃色縷結作十四結痛處繫。
translated: Use yellow thread to make fourteen knots and tie it on the painful area.
By the power of this dharani,

original: 能令三千大千世界六種震動。
analyzed: 能令三千大千世界六種震動。
translated: it can cause the three thousand great one thousand worlds to shake in six ways.
The beings therein, due to their past lives' offenses and defilements,
are wrapped, bound, and confined in obscurity.
Hearing this dharani's single sound passing through their ears,
they will all be reborn in the Heaven of the Thirty-three.

original: 有諸行人受持讀誦書寫此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 有諸行人受持讀誦書寫此陀羅尼者。
translated: There are practitioners who uphold, recite, copy, and write this dharani,

original: 未發心者咸使發心到堅固地。
analyzed: 未發心者咸使發心到堅固地。
translated: Those who have not yet given rise to the aspiration for enlightenment will all be caused to give rise to the aspiration for enlightenment and reach the stage of firmness.
Those who have already given rise to the aspiration for enlightenment will enter the flowing water of the Dharma.
At the same level as the eighth stage, they will quickly reach the stage of Buddhahood.

original: 以此陀羅尼力故。🔽一踴超過菩提樹下。
analyzed: 以此陀羅尼力故。 一踴超過菩提樹下。
translated: By the power of this dhāraṇī,🔽in one leap they will surpass the one under the Bodhi tree.
Up to the stage of Buddhahood, sitting in the place of enlightenment.
This samādhi is called the king of the golden light samādhi.
Awakening the masses, leaping out of the three realms.

original: 拔眾厄難超眾群聖疾成佛道。
analyzed: 拔眾厄難超眾群聖疾成佛道。
translated: Pulling out the many difficulties and calamities, surpassing the many sages, quickly accomplishing Buddhahood.

original: 若有眾生欲修行此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 若有眾生欲修行此陀羅尼者。
translated: If there are sentient beings who wish to practice this dhāraṇī,

original: 欲得現身四沙門果。🔽欲除過去億百千劫。
analyzed: 欲得現身四沙門果。 欲除過去億百千劫。
translated: Wishing to attain the four fruits of śramaṇas in this very life,
Wishing to remove the five heinous crimes and four grave offenses that obstruct the path in hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of kalpas in the past,
In this very life, eliminating them without leaving any remainder.
One should practice this dhāraṇī.

original: 三七二十一日護持禁戒猶如明珠。
analyzed: 三七二十一日護持禁戒猶如明珠。
translated: For twenty-one days, guarding the precepts like a bright pearl,

original: 一日一夜六時行道懺悔十方。
analyzed: 一日一夜六時行道懺悔十方。
translated: For one day and one night, practicing in the six periods and repenting to the ten directions.

original: 淨潔洗浴著新淨衣用七色華三種名香。
analyzed: 淨潔洗浴著新淨衣用七色華三種名香。
translated: Cleanly bathe, put on new clean clothes, and use flowers of seven colors and three kinds of famous incense.
Make offerings and scatter them to Śākyamuni Buddha.

original: 於舍利塔前五體投地悔過自責。
analyzed: 於舍利塔前五體投地悔過自責。
translated: In front of the stūpa containing the Buddha's relics, prostrate with one's whole body and repent of one's faults.

original: 爾時當誦此陀羅尼句八十一遍日日常爾。
analyzed: 爾時當誦此陀羅尼句八十一遍日日常爾。
translated: At that time, recite this dhāraṇī verse eighty-one times, doing this every day.
Even if it takes seven days, one seven-day period,

original: 復至二七日乃至三七日。
analyzed: 復至二七日乃至三七日。
translated: or up to two or three seven-day periods,

original: 億百姟劫所有重罪悉滅無餘。
analyzed: 億百姟劫所有重罪悉滅無餘。
translated: all the grave offenses from hundreds of millions of eons will be completely eradicated without remainder.

original: 十方諸佛放大光明來觸其身。
analyzed: 十方諸佛放大光明來觸其身。
translated: The buddhas of the ten directions will emit great light and touch that person's body.
At that time, the person's mind and thoughts will be joyful.
It will be just like a bhikṣu attaining the third dhyāna.

original: 爾時當有大梵天王釋提桓因四天大王。
analyzed: 爾時當有大梵天王釋提桓因四天大王。
translated: At that time, there will be the great Brahmā king, Śakra Devānām Indra, and the four heavenly kings.
They will immediately bestow the four fruits of the śramaṇa.

original: 大集中云莊嚴大乘瓔珞有四戒定慧無上陀羅尼是故當好持戒。
analyzed: 大集中云莊嚴大乘瓔珞有四戒定慧無上陀羅尼是故當好持戒。
translated: The Great Collection says: The adornments of the Great Vehicle are the four: precepts, concentration, wisdom, and the unsurpassed dhāraṇī. Therefore, one should uphold the precepts well.
The precepts can give rise to concentration, and concentration can give rise to wisdom.

original: 第一文殊師利菩薩所說陀羅尼名閻浮摩兜晉言解眾生縛。
analyzed: 第一文殊師利菩薩所說陀羅尼名閻浮摩兜晉言解眾生縛。
translated: The first dhāraṇī spoken by Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva is named Jambūmacau (meaning to liberate sentient beings from bondage).
It can eliminate all present illnesses and suffering.
It can avert obstacles and pull out the arrow of the three poisons.
The ninety-eight kinds of afflictions will gradually be eliminated.
One will transcend the three realms of existence and attain the Way in this very body.

original: 支富多奈帝　閻浮支奈帝　穌車不支奈帝　祝耆不支奈帝　烏穌多支奈帝　婆遮不支奈帝　闍摩賴長支奈帝　阿恕波賴長支奈帝　如波帝支奈帝　莎呵誦呪三遍縷五色結作二結繫項。
analyzed: 支富多奈帝　閻浮支奈帝　穌車不支奈帝　祝耆不支奈帝　烏穌多支奈帝　婆遮不支奈帝　闍摩賴長支奈帝　阿恕波賴長支奈帝　如波帝支奈帝　莎呵誦呪三遍縷五色結作二結繫項。
translated: Chibudanati, Jambudananati, Sucara-budananati, Jukishi-budananati, Ushushadabudanati, Bacha-budananati, Shamalachabudanati, Ashupa-lachabudanati, Rupadebudanati, Shaha (Recite the mantra three times, use five-colored thread to make two knots, and tie it around the neck.)

original: 此陀羅尼四十二億諸佛所說。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼四十二億諸佛所說。
translated: This dhāraṇī was spoken by 4.2 billion buddhas.

original: 若諸行人有能書寫讀誦此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 若諸行人有能書寫讀誦此陀羅尼者。
translated: If practitioners are able to write, recite, and chant this dhāraṇī,
in this life they will be protected by a thousand buddhas.

original: 此人命終以後不墮惡道。
analyzed: 此人命終以後不墮惡道。
translated: After this person's life ends, they will not fall into evil realms.

original: 當生兜率天上面覩彌勒。
analyzed: 當生兜率天上面覩彌勒。
translated: Will be reborn in Tuṣita Heaven and see Maitreya face to face.

original: 又有眾生能修行此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 又有眾生能修行此陀羅尼者。
translated: Moreover, there are sentient beings who are able to cultivate this dhāraṇī.
Abstain from food for seven days and solely drink cow's milk.
Eat only one meal a day at noon, without any other food.
Repent in the six periods of the day and night.

original: 禮十方佛悔所作罪億千姟劫所有重罪一時都盡。
analyzed: 禮十方佛悔所作罪億千姟劫所有重罪一時都盡。
translated: Bow to the Buddhas of the ten directions and repent of the grave offenses committed in countless eons, all at once completely extinguished.
The offenses of violating the precepts are also completely eradicated.
The grave offenses of the five heinous crimes and icchantikas.

original: 殷重悔過悉亦滅除於六時中一時十遍。
analyzed: 殷重悔過悉亦滅除於六時中一時十遍。
translated: Repent earnestly in the six periods, ten times each period.
In an empty and quiet room, or in a stūpa.
If this person's mind is sincere and genuine.
I will go to his place at that time.

original: 此人以見我故心轉淳厚。
analyzed: 此人以見我故心轉淳厚。
translated: Because this person sees me, his mind becomes even more sincere and genuine.
Because his mind is sincere and genuine, he gets to see a thousand Buddhas.
The Buddhas will rub his head with their hands and give him a prediction.
The grave offenses and evil karma from past lives will be completely eradicated without remainder.

original: 第二我虛空藏菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆晝寧晉言拔眾生苦。
analyzed: 第二我虛空藏菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆晝寧晉言拔眾生苦。
translated: Second, Bodhisattva Akasagarbha wishes to speak a great dhāraṇī named Anāghāpiṇḍa (meaning to remove the suffering of sentient beings).
It is unparalleled in the three realms.

original: 若有眾生迴波六趣無能救者。
analyzed: 若有眾生迴波六趣無能救者。
translated: If there are sentient beings wandering in the six destinies without anyone to save them,
I will save them and enable them to escape from difficulties.

original: 阿那耆晝穌　不利帝那耆晝穌　若波晝耆晝穌　卑利帝那耆晝穌　破奴波㝹耆晝穌　烏奢帝那耆晝穌　若波晝耆晝穌　阿若浮婆耆晝穌　莎呵誦呪五遍。
analyzed: 阿那耆晝穌　不利帝那耆晝穌　若波晝耆晝穌　卑利帝那耆晝穌　破奴波㝹耆晝穌　烏奢帝那耆晝穌　若波晝耆晝穌　阿若浮婆耆晝穌　莎呵誦呪五遍。
translated: Anāghāpiṇḍa Sū-līti Nāghāpiṇḍa Sū-yavāpiṇḍa Sū-pīti Nāghāpiṇḍa Sū-pānupiṇḍa Sū-ūṣetipāghāpiṇḍa Sū-yavāpiṇḍa Sū-āyubhāpiṇḍa Sū-śāha (Recite the mantra five times.)

original: 縷五色結作十四結繫兩手。
analyzed: 縷五色結作十四結繫兩手。
translated: String the five colors and make fourteen knots, tying them on both hands.

original: 此陀羅尼句乃是過去七十二億諸佛所說。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼句乃是過去七十二億諸佛所說。
translated: This dhāraṇī was spoken by seventy-two koṭīs of Buddhas in the past.
I have now spoken it.
In order to protect the true Dharma and deliver sentient beings,
And to enable practitioners to accomplish myriad practices.

original: 諸聲聞人未證果者令得果故。
analyzed: 諸聲聞人未證果者令得果故。
translated: In order to enable the śrāvakas who have not yet attained the fruits to attain the fruits.

original: 令緣覺人度十二因緣大河拯濟群生故。
analyzed: 令緣覺人度十二因緣大河拯濟群生故。
translated: In order to enable the pratyekabuddhas to cross the great river of the twelve links of dependent origination and rescue sentient beings.

original: 令諸菩薩從初發心乃至十地願果成故。
analyzed: 令諸菩薩從初發心乃至十地願果成故。
translated: In order to enable the bodhisattvas to fulfill their vows from their initial generation of the mind of enlightenment up to the tenth ground.
This dhāraṇī is taught.
Moreover, the power of this dhāraṇī🔽Can cause the sentient beings
In the trichiliocosm,
Who are in the dark and hidden places,
And in the sufferings of the three evil paths,

original: 聞此陀羅尼一經耳處得宿命智。
analyzed: 聞此陀羅尼一經耳處得宿命智。
translated: To attain the knowledge of past lives upon hearing this dhāraṇī once.
And up to fourteen lifetimes, they will all attain liberation.
If there are good men and good women
Who wish to practice this dhāraṇī,

original: 應當三七日淨自洗浴著新淨衣。
analyzed: 應當三七日淨自洗浴著新淨衣。
translated: They should purify themselves by bathing for twenty-one days and wear new clean clothes.
Either in a temple or a pure place,

original: 於夜後分明星出時語此大明星。
analyzed: 於夜後分明星出時語此大明星。
translated: At the time when the bright star appears in the late night, speak to this great bright star:
Tell Bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha for me.
Say this three times.
Please remove my fundamental offenses. Say this three times.
Please remove my offenses that obstruct the path. Say this three times.

original: 與我四沙門果如是三說。
analyzed: 與我四沙門果如是三說。
translated: Please bestow the four fruits of the śramaṇa on me. Say this three times.
At that time, I will immediately go to that place.

original: 住其人前授與四沙門果。
analyzed: 住其人前授與四沙門果。
translated: Dwelling in front of that person, I will bestow the four fruits of the śramaṇa.
I vow to bestow this. Say this three times.
Burn agarwood.

original: 若夢得阿摩勒果。🔽若得呵梨勒果。
analyzed: 若夢得阿摩勒果。 若得呵梨勒果。
translated: If in a dream one obtains an āmalaka fruit,🔽if one obtains a harītaki fruit,
if one obtains a bibhītaka fruit,
if one obtains a viḍaṅga fruit or apricots, etc.,
at that time one should diligently make effort.
If the size is like a chicken egg or a fist,

original: 爾時即於明星出時誦呪七遍。
analyzed: 爾時即於明星出時誦呪七遍。
translated: at that time, at the time when the morning star appears, recite the mantra seven times.
If the mind is in a good state, recite it seven times again.
Bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha always travels to various countries.
For practitioners to attain from myriad practices,

original: 第三我觀世音菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆不智究梨智那晉言大拯濟。
analyzed: 第三我觀世音菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆不智究梨智那晉言大拯濟。
translated: The third is Bodhisattva Avalokiteśvara, who wishes to speak a great dhāraṇī called Anapati-jñānakīrti (Great Rescue in Chinese).

original: 普及十方無邊眾生。🔽烏奢帝那　耆那智帝那　不迦兜帝那　那殊不梨帝那　阿摩殊不梨帝那　烏奢那吒帝那　耆浮浮帝那　耆都晝帝那　若波暮那賴帝那　漚究那賴帝那　支波富那賴帝那　閻浮浮賴帝那　莎呵誦呪五遍。🔽縷五色結作二十四結繫項。🔽此陀羅尼句。🔽乃是過去九十九億諸佛所說。

If there are devas and sages in the trichiliocosm

original: 諸神仙人未發無上菩提心者。
analyzed: 諸神仙人未發無上菩提心者。
translated: who have not yet aroused the mind of unsurpassed enlightenment,
they should all be made to arouse the mind.
There are ordinary beings who have not yet attained faith.
I will use seeds to cause the sprouts of the Dharma to grow.
By the majestic power of this dhāraṇī
and my skillful means,
I will enable their cultivation to be accomplished.
And in the trichiliocosm,

original: 幽隱黑暗滯礙及三塗眾生。
analyzed: 幽隱黑暗滯礙及三塗眾生。
translated: the dark and gloomy obstructions and the beings of the three evil paths,

original: 又聞我此陀羅尼者皆得拔苦。
analyzed: 又聞我此陀羅尼者皆得拔苦。
translated: and those who hear this dhāraṇī of mine will all be liberated from suffering.
Moreover, the bodhisattvas who have not yet reached the first stage
will attain the first stage.
In sequence, they will attain up to the tenth stage.
Those who have already attained the tenth stage
will, by the power of this dhāraṇī,
in a single thought, reach the stage of buddhahood.

original: 三十二相八十種好自然成熟。
analyzed: 三十二相八十種好自然成熟。
translated: The thirty-two marks and eighty minor marks will naturally be perfected.

original: 若聲聞人聞此陀羅尼一經耳者。
analyzed: 若聲聞人聞此陀羅尼一經耳者。
translated: If a śrāvaka hears this dhāraṇī once,

original: 讀誦書寫修行此陀羅尼。
analyzed: 讀誦書寫修行此陀羅尼。
translated: Recites, writes, and practices this dhāraṇī,
With a sincere mind, abiding in accordance with the Dharma,
The four fruits of the śramaṇa will be attained without seeking.
By the power of this dhāraṇī,
In the trichiliocosm,

original: 山河石壁四大海水能令涌沸。
analyzed: 山河石壁四大海水能令涌沸。
translated: Mountains, rivers, rocks, and the four great oceans will be made to boil.

original: 須彌山及鐵圍山令如微塵。
analyzed: 須彌山及鐵圍山令如微塵。
translated: Mount Sumeru and the Iron Encircling Mountains will be reduced to dust.

original: 其中眾生悉發無上菩提之心。
analyzed: 其中眾生悉發無上菩提之心。
translated: The sentient beings therein will all give rise to the mind of unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: 有諸菩薩聲聞修行之者。
analyzed: 有諸菩薩聲聞修行之者。
translated: There are bodhisattvas and śrāvakas who practice.
Obstructions and hindrances to the path, afflictions and suffering befall the body.
I will save them all and enable them to escape difficulties.
Cause what they cultivate to be accomplished.

original: 若有眾生現世求所願者。
analyzed: 若有眾生現世求所願者。
translated: If there are sentient beings who seek their wishes in the present world,
Those who practice the dhāraṇī,

original: 於三七二十一日淨持戒地。
analyzed: 於三七二十一日淨持戒地。
translated: On a pure ground of precepts,
For twenty-one days, practicing six times a day,
Burning various famous incense and scattering flowers of five colors,
Repent of the offenses and faults in the ten directions.

original: 從生死際至生死際自責慚愧。
analyzed: 從生死際至生死際自責慚愧。
translated: From the edge of birth and death to the edge of birth and death, repent and feel ashamed.

original: 爾時三稱我觀世音菩薩。
analyzed: 爾時三稱我觀世音菩薩。
translated: At that time, chant the name of Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva three times.
Burn incense, scatter flowers, and kowtow to seek compassion.

original: 悔過自責億百千劫所有重罪。
analyzed: 悔過自責億百千劫所有重罪。
translated: Repent and reflect on the heavy offenses of hundreds of thousands of kalpas.

original: 於一念頃皆得消滅淨身口意。
analyzed: 於一念頃皆得消滅淨身口意。
translated: In an instant, they will all be eliminated, purifying body, speech, and mind.

original: 爾時當誦此陀羅尼三七二十一遍。
analyzed: 爾時當誦此陀羅尼三七二十一遍。
translated: At that time, recite this dharani twenty-one times, three times.

original: 日夜六時從初一日乃至七日。
analyzed: 日夜六時從初一日乃至七日。
translated: Six times a day, from the first day to the seventh day.
Up to twenty-one days.
For those with dull faculties who have not attained the first fruit,

original: 我於爾時授與初果第二第三乃至第四果。
analyzed: 我於爾時授與初果第二第三乃至第四果。
translated: At that time, I will bestow the first fruit, the second, third, and even the fourth fruit.

original: 隨其利鈍階差所應若諸菩薩欲趣證地滯礙不進。
analyzed: 隨其利鈍階差所應若諸菩薩欲趣證地滯礙不進。
translated: According to their sharpness or dullness, if the bodhisattvas wish to realize the grounds but are hindered and do not progress,

original: 如法行者即得證地如前法網。
analyzed: 如法行者即得證地如前法網。
translated: Those who practice according to the Dharma will immediately realize the grounds, as in the Dharma net above.
I now explain this dharani phrase.
Within the trichiliocosm,

original: 其中諸佛諸菩薩釋梵四天王諸仙人及諸龍王。
analyzed: 其中諸佛諸菩薩釋梵四天王諸仙人及諸龍王。
translated: The buddhas, bodhisattvas, Śakra, Brahmā, the four heavenly kings, sages, and nāga kings among them
all bear witness to the great vows being accomplished.
The fruits of the vows are not false, but true just as they are.

original: 第四我救脫菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆知羅晉言救諸病苦。
analyzed: 第四我救脫菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆知羅晉言救諸病苦。
translated: Fourth, I, the Bodhisattva Savior, wish to speak a great dhāraṇī called A-na-qi-zhi-luo (meaning saving from all suffering).
It eliminates all poisonous medicines and delivers sentient beings.
It leads them out of birth and death.
It liberates those who are not yet liberated, comforts those who are not yet at ease,
and causes those who have not yet attained nirvāṇa to attain nirvāṇa.
This dhāraṇī phrase

original: 乃是過去七十七億諸佛所說我欲說之。
analyzed: 乃是過去七十七億諸佛所說我欲說之。
translated: was spoken by 7.7 billion buddhas of the past. I wish to speak it.

original: 五色縷結作六結繫兩肩。
analyzed: 五色縷結作六結繫兩肩。
translated: Use five-colored thread to make six knots and tie them around both shoulders.
When I now speak this dhāraṇī,

original: 三千大千世界其中所有一切眾生。
analyzed: 三千大千世界其中所有一切眾生。
translated: all sentient beings in the trichiliocosm

analyzed: 所有罪垢殃惡重病。 以我法音聲震三千。
translated: will have their heavy illnesses of sinful defilements and misfortune

analyzed: 散入一切眾生毛孔六情諸根。
translated: dissipated and enter the pores of all sentient beings through the six sense faculties,
presenting painful and oppressive poisonous qi,
as well as past karmic afflictions and feverish distress,
all being completely eliminated without remainder.
Moreover, practitioners who are weary of the three realms
and wish to seek liberation but are unable to attain it,
I will devise innumerable skillful means for them.
Allowing their wishes to be fulfilled.

original: 如其國土有諸隣敵欲來侵陵。
analyzed: 如其國土有諸隣敵欲來侵陵。
translated: If there are neighboring enemies in their countries who wish to invade and oppress,
I will save them and allow them to escape from danger.
At that time, the king should feel ashamed,
Repent, and blame himself, returning to repent to the myriad people.
Cleanly bathe and put on new, clean clothes.
Either on a high building or in a palace,
Burn incense, scatter flowers, and pay homage to the Buddhas of the ten directions.

original: 爾時當三稱我名救脫菩薩。
analyzed: 爾時當三稱我名救脫菩薩。
translated: At that time, one should chant my name, the Bodhisattva of Rescue, three times.
I now take refuge in this, spoken three times.

original: 爾時即當誦此陀羅尼三七二十一遍隨其方面有賊來處。
analyzed: 爾時即當誦此陀羅尼三七二十一遍隨其方面有賊來處。
translated: At that time, one should recite this dhāraṇī twenty-one times, in the direction where the thieves are coming from.
At that time, there will be eight kinds of spirits

original: 雨沙礫石放大黑風雷震霹靂。
analyzed: 雨沙礫石放大黑風雷震霹靂。
translated: Raining sand, pebbles, and stones, releasing a great black wind, thunder, and lightning.
Like the collapse of the heavens, shaking the heavens and the earth.
At that time, the enemy thieves will naturally retreat and scatter.

original: 我救脫菩薩拔濟眾生神力如是。
analyzed: 我救脫菩薩拔濟眾生神力如是。
translated: The Bodhisattva Savior and Liberator's spiritual power in rescuing sentient beings is like this.

original: 第五我跋陀和菩薩欲說大陀羅尼。
analyzed: 第五我跋陀和菩薩欲說大陀羅尼。
translated: Fifth, the Bodhisattva Bhadra wishes to speak a great dhāraṇī.
This dhāraṇī phrase

original: 乃是過去七十七億諸佛所說。
analyzed: 乃是過去七十七億諸佛所說。
translated: was spoken by 77 koṭīs of Buddhas in the past.

original: 我今欲說有陀羅尼名阿那耆置盧晉言度脫眾生。
analyzed: 我今欲說有陀羅尼名阿那耆置盧晉言度脫眾生。
translated: I now wish to speak a dhāraṇī called Anaghijita (Skt. anuttarā), which means to deliver sentient beings.
From the sufferings of old age, sickness, death, and the three evil paths,

original: 眾生現在病苦悉皆拯濟。
analyzed: 眾生現在病苦悉皆拯濟。
translated: and to rescue all sentient beings from their present sufferings.

original: 此呪能令地作水相水作地相。
analyzed: 此呪能令地作水相水作地相。
translated: This spell can make earth have the characteristics of water, and water have the characteristics of earth.
Wind has the characteristics of fire, and fire has the characteristics of wind.
The trichiliocosm has the characteristics of fine dust.

original: 色作虛空相虛空作色相。
analyzed: 色作虛空相虛空作色相。
translated: Form has the characteristics of empty space, and empty space has the characteristics of form.

original: 下至金剛際上至淨居天。
analyzed: 下至金剛際上至淨居天。
translated: Down to the adamantine sphere, up to the Heaven of Pure Abode.
Transform into non-form characteristics.
If within the trichiliocosm,
There are practitioners whose four elements are imbalanced,
If their practice of the Way is obstructed and they are not in harmony,
I will use my golden-colored hand to rub the top of their heads.

original: 授與湯藥令其所患消滅無餘。
analyzed: 授與湯藥令其所患消滅無餘。
translated: I will give them soup and medicine to make their illnesses completely disappear without remainder.
If they practice the Way, they will make progress and their four elements will be light and convenient.

original: 有諸眾生為宿業罪垢纏裹縛束。
analyzed: 有諸眾生為宿業罪垢纏裹縛束。
translated: There are sentient beings who are bound by the defilements of their past karma and are wrapped up in it.
They are in the prison of the three realms and have no way out.

original: 我時當以智慧火及禪定水。
analyzed: 我時當以智慧火及禪定水。
translated: At that time, I will use the fire of wisdom and the water of meditation
to burn and wash them clean, allowing them to leave the three realms.
I will soak them with the ointment of sarvajña (omniscience) and make them moist.
I will cause the sprouts of the Dharma to grow.
I will pull out their poisonous arrows

original: 咸使令發無上菩提道心。
analyzed: 咸使令發無上菩提道心。
translated: and cause them all to give rise to the mind of the unsurpassed bodhi path.

original: 若諸眾生於今現身欲求所願者。🔽欲求尊貴欲求聰明。
analyzed: 若諸眾生於今現身欲求所願者。 欲求尊貴欲求聰明。
translated: If sentient beings in their present bodies wish to seek their wishes,🔽if they wish for nobility, wish for wisdom,
wish for dhāraṇī, wish for wisdom,
wish to see the buddhas of the ten directions,
face to face, speak together, and receive predictions,
wish to see me, the bodhisattva Bhadra,
and receive the four fruits of the śramaṇa.

original: 欲得命終生兜率天上見彌勒。
analyzed: 欲得命終生兜率天上見彌勒。
translated: If you wish to be reborn in Tuṣita Heaven upon death to see Maitreya,

original: 欲生他方淨佛國土現在佛前。
analyzed: 欲生他方淨佛國土現在佛前。
translated: Or to be reborn in the pure buddha lands of other directions in the presence of the Buddha,

original: 當書寫讀誦修行此陀羅尼。
analyzed: 當書寫讀誦修行此陀羅尼。
translated: You should write, recite, and practice this dhāraṇī.
You should be content with few desires and purely uphold the precepts.
You should always be ashamed and cultivate straightforward conduct.

original: 於一日一夜六時之中精進不闕。
analyzed: 於一日一夜六時之中精進不闕。
translated: In the six periods of a day and night, you should be diligent and not neglect.
You should not let garlic, alcohol, meat, or other impure substances pass your lips.

original: 如是精進一百一十四日內外明徹。
analyzed: 如是精進一百一十四日內外明徹。
translated: If you are diligent in this way for 114 days, you will be clear inside and out.

original: 面對十方諸佛面覩受記。
analyzed: 面對十方諸佛面覩受記。
translated: You will face the buddhas of the ten directions and receive predictions in person.

original: 善男子汝過如是若干劫數。
analyzed: 善男子汝過如是若干劫數。
translated: Good man, after so many eons,
You will attain buddhahood with a country like this.
The number of your disciples and your lifespan will be like this.
If a śrāvaka wishes to attain the four fruits,

original: 亦當如是修行此陀羅尼功用正等無異。
analyzed: 亦當如是修行此陀羅尼功用正等無異。
translated: He should also practice this dhāraṇī in the same way, with the same merit and function.
The differences in realization are based on the sharpness or dullness of one's faculties.

original: 我跋陀和菩薩所說陀羅尼句。
analyzed: 我跋陀和菩薩所說陀羅尼句。
translated: The dhāraṇī mantra spoken by me, the bodhisattva Bhadra,
Has such divine power, it is true and not false.

original: 第六我大勢至菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆置盧晉言救諸病苦。
analyzed: 第六我大勢至菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆置盧晉言救諸病苦。
translated: Sixth, I, the bodhisattva Mahāsthāmaprāpta, wish to speak a great dhāraṇī called Saving from All Illness and Suffering in Sanskrit.

original: 斷諸疑網拔四倒毒箭令出三界。
analyzed: 斷諸疑網拔四倒毒箭令出三界。
translated: It can cut off all doubts and nets, pull out the poisonous arrows of the four inverted views, and lead one out of the three realms.

original: 耆富咤那帝　阿輸波羅帝　耆晝盧波羅帝　阿輸多波羅帝　烏那呼波羅帝　若牟耶波羅帝　圖故晝波羅帝　若牟耶波羅帝　莎呵誦呪三遍縷三色結作三結繫項。

translated: Ji fu zha na di, a shu po luo di, ji zhou lu po luo di, a shu tuo po luo di, wu na hu po luo di, ruo mou ya po luo di, tu gu zhou po luo di, ruo mou ya po luo di, sha he Recite the mantra three times, use three-colored thread, tie three knots, and fasten it around the neck.
This dhāraṇī mantra,
Was spoken by 77 koṭīs of buddhas.
I have now finished speaking it.

original: 此陀羅尼力能令三千大千世界地皆震裂。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼力能令三千大千世界地皆震裂。
translated: The power of this dhāraṇī can cause the earth of the trichiliocosm to quake and split,
And the beings within it will naturally leap out.
At that time, I will use the power of wisdom,
At one time, receive them and place them in one place.

original: 即以禪定清涼法水洗濯塵垢。
analyzed: 即以禪定清涼法水洗濯塵垢。
translated: Then, with the cool water of meditation, wash away the dust and dirt.
Rub and wipe them, and comfort their minds.
It is just like a bhikṣu entering the third dhyāna.
Then, I shall follow their faculties, sharp or dull,

original: 應得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者。
analyzed: 應得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者。
translated: Those who should attain anuttarā-samyak-saṃbodhi,
According to their stages, I will give them all.

original: 若聲聞人應得四沙門果者。
analyzed: 若聲聞人應得四沙門果者。
translated: If there are śrāvaka people who should attain the four fruits of the śramaṇa,
I will give them in order and fulfill their wishes.

original: 有諸行人書寫讀誦此陀羅尼句。
analyzed: 有諸行人書寫讀誦此陀羅尼句。
translated: There are practitioners who write, read, and recite these dhāraṇī phrases.
In their present bodies, the four hundred and four illnesses,
Violations of the precepts, the five heinous crimes, and the offenses that obstruct the path,

original: 宿世微殃悉皆消滅無有遺餘。
analyzed: 宿世微殃悉皆消滅無有遺餘。
translated: Even the slightest misfortune from past lives will all be eliminated without remainder.

original: 我大勢至菩薩威神力故。
analyzed: 我大勢至菩薩威神力故。
translated: By the majestic spiritual power of the Bodhisattva Mahāsthāmaprāpta,

original: 令此行人所修轉勝悉得成辦。
analyzed: 令此行人所修轉勝悉得成辦。
translated: He will cause these practitioners' cultivation to become more excellent and all be accomplished.

original: 有諸行人在所生處得宿命智。
analyzed: 有諸行人在所生處得宿命智。
translated: There are practitioners who, in the places where they are born, attain the wisdom of recollecting past lives.

original: 百生千生百千萬億生通達無礙。
analyzed: 百生千生百千萬億生通達無礙。
translated: In hundreds of lives, thousands of lives, hundreds of thousands of millions of lives, they will attain unobstructed understanding,
Like observing an āmalaka fruit in the palm of the hand.
If one wishes to attain dhāraṇīs for hearing and retaining,
If one wishes to attain the four unobstructed abilities to expound the Dharma,
If one wishes to attain the ten powers of a Buddha and the four forms of fearlessness,

original: 欲得修佛三十二相八十種好速得成辦。
analyzed: 欲得修佛三十二相八十種好速得成辦。
translated: If one wishes to quickly accomplish the cultivation of the thirty-two marks and eighty minor marks of a Buddha,

original: 欲得金剛三昧超過十地入佛正位。
analyzed: 欲得金剛三昧超過十地入佛正位。
translated: If one wishes to attain vajra samādhi and surpass the ten grounds to enter the correct stage of a Buddha,

original: 應當書寫讀誦修行此陀羅尼。
analyzed: 應當書寫讀誦修行此陀羅尼。
translated: One should write, recite, and practice this dhāraṇī.
Day and night, in the six periods of time, never neglecting it,

original: 淨持戒地五辛酒肉悉不食之。
analyzed: 淨持戒地五辛酒肉悉不食之。
translated: Purely upholding the precepts, not eating the five pungent things, alcohol, or meat.
With few desires and contentment, cultivating straightforward conduct.
Because of practicing this dhāraṇī,
No non-human being will be able to disturb them.
I will then, together with Śakra, Brahmā, and the Four Heavenly Kings,

original: 往詣是人所住之處安慰其心。
analyzed: 往詣是人所住之處安慰其心。
translated: Go to the place where this person resides to comfort their mind,
Causing their cultivation to increase day by day.

original: 第七我得大勢菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名烏穌波置樓晉言救諸病苦。
analyzed: 第七我得大勢菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名烏穌波置樓晉言救諸病苦。
translated: The seventh, the Bodhisattva Mahāsthāmaprāpta, wished to speak a great dhāraṇī named Ususabapilou (meaning to save all those suffering from illness).
It can rescue sentient beings and lead them out of the three realms.
It enables practitioners to accomplish the myriad practices.

This dhāraṇī phrase

original: 乃是過去四十億恒河沙等諸佛所說。
analyzed: 乃是過去四十億恒河沙等諸佛所說。
translated: Was spoken by Buddhas equal to the sands of forty koṭīs of Ganges Rivers in the past.
I have now spoken it.

original: 此陀羅尼力能令十佛世界六種震動。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼力能令十佛世界六種震動。
translated: The power of this dhāraṇī can cause the ten Buddha-lands to quake in six ways.
All sentient beings within it,

original: 以此陀羅尼法音光明入其毛孔。
analyzed: 以此陀羅尼法音光明入其毛孔。
translated: By the light of the Dharma sound of this dhāraṇī entering their pores,
The afflictions and habitual tendencies of dust and defilements will be eliminated at once.
By the power of my great influence and spiritual power,
And by the spiritual power of this dhāraṇī,
After the end of these sentient beings' lives,

original: 悉得往生兜率天上面見彌勒。
analyzed: 悉得往生兜率天上面見彌勒。
translated: They will all be reborn in Tuṣita Heaven and see Maitreya face to face.
If practitioners wish to seek liberation,
But are hindered by karmic obstacles,
Lazy and indolent, with the three karmas not diligent,

original: 我時即以智慧火禪定水。
analyzed: 我時即以智慧火禪定水。
translated: I will then use the fire of wisdom and the water of meditative concentration,

original: 燒燃洗濯業垢障道令其惺悟。
analyzed: 燒燃洗濯業垢障道令其惺悟。
translated: To burn and wash away the karmic defilements that obstruct the path, causing them to awaken,
And make them all give rise to the mind of enlightenment.

original: 有諸行人四大不調病苦嬰身。
analyzed: 有諸行人四大不調病苦嬰身。
translated: If there are practitioners whose four elements are unbalanced and who suffer from illness,
If they are able to read and recite this dhāraṇī,

original: 我時當與八部鬼神四天大王往是人所。
analyzed: 我時當與八部鬼神四天大王往是人所。
translated: I will then go with the eight divisions of ghosts and spirits and the four heavenly kings to where that person is,
And immediately give them the agada medicine.
Like a wish-fulfilling jewel, it ensures that nothing is lacking.
These good men and good women,
By the power of my spiritual penetrations and the power of the dhāraṇī,
Will attain great fruits through redoubled diligence.

original: 第八我堅勇菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆置樓晉言救濟眾生。
analyzed: 第八我堅勇菩薩欲說大陀羅尼名阿那耆置樓晉言救濟眾生。
translated: Eighth, I, the Bodhisattva Firm Courage, wish to speak a great dhāraṇī named Anaghijīlou (Skt. trāṇī), which means to rescue sentient beings.

original: 出生死苦拯濟三界貧窮眾生如寶掌菩薩。
analyzed: 出生死苦拯濟三界貧窮眾生如寶掌菩薩。
translated: It gives rise to the suffering of birth and death, and rescues sentient beings in the three realms who are poor, like Bodhisattva Ratnapāṇi.

original: 亦如國王解髻中明珠施與貧窮。
analyzed: 亦如國王解髻中明珠施與貧窮。
translated: It is also like a king who unties the bright pearl from his topknot and gives it to the poor,
Like a loving father showing his child a treasure trove.
The power of this dhāraṇī is also like this.

original: 若無呼波置樓　烏穌多置樓　若無耆置樓　烏酥呼那耆置樓　若物殊置樓　毘利帝那置樓　烏奢欽置樓　遮不呼酥多置樓若無蜜多置樓　阿支不置樓　毘梨帝那置樓　莎呵誦呪三遍縷三色結作七結痛處繫。
analyzed: 若無呼波置樓　烏穌多置樓　若無耆置樓　烏酥呼那耆置樓　若物殊置樓　毘利帝那置樓　烏奢欽置樓　遮不呼酥多置樓若無蜜多置樓　阿支不置樓　毘梨帝那置樓　莎呵誦呪三遍縷三色結作七結痛處繫。

original: 此陀羅尼句乃是過去七十七億諸佛所說我今說之。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼句乃是過去七十七億諸佛所說我今說之。
translated: This dhāraṇī was spoken by 7.7 billion buddhas of the past. I now speak it.

original: 有諸國王其國土境水旱不調穀米不登。
analyzed: 有諸國王其國土境水旱不調穀米不登。
translated: There are kings whose lands have irregular rainfall and poor harvests.

original: 爾時應當誦此陀羅尼七十七遍。
analyzed: 爾時應當誦此陀羅尼七十七遍。
translated: At that time, they should recite this dhāraṇī 77 times.
And chant my name, Bodhisattva Firm Courage, three times.

original: 我時當勅阿耨大龍娑伽羅龍使諸小龍給足其水令國豐實若其國內疫病流行。
analyzed: 我時當勅阿耨大龍娑伽羅龍使諸小龍給足其水令國豐實若其國內疫病流行。
translated: I will then order the great dragon Anavatapta and the dragon Sāgara to have the lesser dragons provide sufficient water to make the country prosperous and have abundant harvests. If there is an epidemic in the country,
There are sentient beings whose bodies are afflicted by illness and suffering.
At that time, I will go to where these people are.
According to their specific afflictions, I will treat and rescue them.
There are sentient beings who lack wealth and possessions.
I will provide them with what they need, so that they have nothing lacking.
If the kings of various countries wish to seek their wishes,
They should practice this dhāraṇī.
Whether in a stūpa or in a secluded place,
Cleanly bathe and put on new clean clothes.
For seven days and seven nights, observe the eight precepts.
In each of the six periods of the day,
Recite this dhāraṇī seven times.
If the mind of the king is sincere and thick,
In three days and three nights, he will attain his wish.
At most, within seven days, he will not fail to achieve his goal.
Burn black agarwood and white sandalwood incense.
Scatter flowers of five colors and light sesame oil lamps.

original: 於月八日十四日十五日。
analyzed: 於月八日十四日十五日。
translated: On the eighth day, fourteenth day, and fifteenth day of the month,

analyzed: 是時三稱我名堅勇菩薩。
translated: At that time, chant my name, Bodhisattva Firm Courage, three times.
I will then, together with the devas, nāgas, and the eight divisions of beings,
go to that person and grant his wishes.

translated: If that person, either in a dream or with a clear mind,

original: 名支波晝　毘尼波晝　烏穌波晝此呪有能正東向。
analyzed: 名支波晝　毘尼波晝　烏穌波晝此呪有能正東向。

sitting, recite this spell of Samantabhadra Bodhisattva.

original: 若利根者即見普賢菩薩。
analyzed: 若利根者即見普賢菩薩。
translated: If one has sharp faculties, one will see Samantabhadra Bodhisattva.

analyzed: 若鈍根者即得消一切障。

in a secluded place, such as an araṇya,

walking and reciting it for one day and one night,
will see Avalokiteśvara.

analyzed: 南無觀世音菩薩救護世間者。

I, so-and-so, now sincerely take refuge.
I wish to fulfill all my wishes and attain them.

analyzed: 若欲坐禪讀誦欲多聞義。
translated: If you wish to sit in meditation, recite, wish for much learning and understanding,
wish to expound the Dharma for others and teach those with wrong views,
wish to seek clothing, food, and offerings,
all your wishes will surely be fulfilled.
If you can fast for one day and one night,
bathe and wash yourself, put on clean clothes,
be alone, walk, and recite this dhāraṇī,
your wishes will surely be fulfilled.
Then he spoke the dhāraṇī verses:

original: 南無觀世音師子無畏音大慈柔軟音大梵清淨音大光普照音天人丈夫音能施眾生樂濟度生死岸。

translated: Namo Avalokitesvara, the fearless lion's roar, the great compassionate and gentle voice, the great Brahma's pure voice, the great light's universal illuminating voice, the voice of devas, humans, and men, the one who can bestow happiness to sentient beings and ferry them across the shore of birth and death.

original: 觀世音菩薩陀羅尼南無觀世音菩薩　多擲哆丘梨丘梨頭吒頭吒　婆度斯摩彌　婆羅呵囉哆　莎呵此陀羅尼晨朝三遍誦之一切吉祥。

translated: Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva's Dharani Namo Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva, Trita Kucchi Kucchi Tatta Tatta, Bhadrasammati, Bhadrapadana, Shaha This dharani should be recited three times in the morning for all auspiciousness.

Burn good agarwood incense, and the incense smoke will not cease.

original: 要用黃花八百枚令人得福。
analyzed: 要用黃花八百枚令人得福。
translated: Use 800 yellow flowers to make people obtain blessings.
If a good man seeks peace and security in his present body,
and the wishes in his mind, he will obtain them all.
If it is a woman, she will be transformed into a man.

original: 能至心一日一夜六時行道誦持之者。
analyzed: 能至心一日一夜六時行道誦持之者。
translated: If one can sincerely practice the six periods of the day and night and recite and uphold it,

original: 却三刧之罪永不入惡趣。
analyzed: 却三刧之罪永不入惡趣。
translated: One will eliminate the sins of three kalpas and will never enter the evil realms.

original: 要用春秋涼時三月八月四月九月。
analyzed: 要用春秋涼時三月八月四月九月。
